uniequip_002_mlyss.name: Pure Water is Life
uniequip_002_mlyss.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat. Flowing Shapes can partially copy an undeployed Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block Count, Attack Interval, Attack Range, Damage Type, and obtain a special trait depending on whether in melee or ranged form), gain {SP} SP after first deployment, will respawn 25 seconds after being defeated

uniequip_002_mlyss.name: Pure Water is Life
uniequip_002_mlyss.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat. Flowing Shapes can copy an undeployed Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block Count, Attack Interval, Attack Range, Damage Type, and obtain a special trait depending on whether in melee or ranged form), gain {SP} SP after first deployment, will respawn 25 seconds after being defeated

uniequip_002_vigil.name: Leader of the Wolfpack
uniequip_002_vigil.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Wolfpack initially consisting of 3 'Wolf Shadows' at the Tactical Point to assist in combat; The number of 'Wolf Shadows' increases by 1 every 25 seconds (up to a maximum of 3; each 'Wolf Shadow' increases the Wolfpack's Block by 1 and causes its attacks to deal an additional instance of damage; when 'Wolf Shadow' defeated, Wolfpack gain {Dodge} Physical Dodge for {duration} seconds)

uniequip_002_vigil.name: Leader of the Wolfpack
uniequip_002_vigil.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Wolfpack initially consisting of 3 'Wolf Shadows' at the Tactical Point to assist in combat; The number of 'Wolf Shadows' increases by 1 every 25 seconds (up to a maximum of 3; each 'Wolf Shadow' increases the Wolfpack's Block by 1 and causes its attacks to deal an additional instance of damage; when 'Wolf Shadow' defeated, Wolfpack gain {Dodge} Physical Dodge for {duration} seconds)

uniequip_002_blkngt.name: Nightwalker
uniequip_002_blkngt.upgradeDescription: When there are <$ba.sleep>Sleeping</> enemies enemies within Attack Range, Blacknight and Slumberfoot ATK +{ATK:0%}

uniequip_002_blkngt.name: Nightwalker
uniequip_002_blkngt.upgradeDescription: When there are <$ba.sleep>Sleeping</> enemies enemies within Attack Range, Blacknight and Slumberfoot ATK +{ATK:0%}

uniequip_002_bstalk.name: Professional Breeder
uniequip_002_bstalk.upgradeDescription: Can summon Metal Crabs to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; When blocking enemies, Metal Crabs DEF +{def:0%}; Metal Crabs will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated

uniequip_002_bstalk.name: Professional Breeder
uniequip_002_bstalk.upgradeDescription: Can summon Metal Crabs to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; When blocking enemies, Metal Crabs DEF +{def:0%}; Metal Crabs will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated

uniequip_002_ABCDEF.upgradeDescription:
Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have 18% Movement Speed, dealing {%ATK} of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for {Duration} seconds (can stack 3 time)

Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have 18% Movement Speed, dealing {%ATK}<@ba.talpu>(+1%)</> of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for {Duration} seconds (can stack 3 time)

Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have -18% Movement Speed, dealing {%ATK} of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for {Duration} seconds (can stack 3 time)

Attacks inflict the following effects to enemies:
have -18% Movement Speed, dealing {%ATK}<@ba.talpu>(+1%)</> of Ascalon's ATK as Arts damage per second for {Duration} seconds (can stack 3 time)
The first hit on each enemy deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds
The first hit on each enemy deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</><@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds
The first hit on each enemy deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds
The first hit on each enemy deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</><@ba.talpu>(+5%)</> of ATK as Art damage and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for 2.5 seconds
When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores {hp_ratio:0%} of Max HP
When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores {hp_ratio:0%}<@ba.talpu>(+1%)</> of Max HP
When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores {hp_ratio:0%} of Max HP
When an enemy blocked by self is killed, restores {hp_ratio:0%}<@ba.talpu>(+1%)</> of Max HP

uniequip_003_heyak.name: Bygone Wings
uniequip_003_heyak.upgradeDescription: Applies <$ba.weightless>Weightless</> to enemies with {HP:0%} or more HP within Attack Range, {damage_scale} <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> to enemies with 50% or less HP within Attack Range

uniequip_003_heyak.name: Bygone Wings
uniequip_003_heyak.upgradeDescription: Applies <$ba.weightless>Weightless</> to enemies with {HP:0%} or more HP within Attack Range, {damage_scale} <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> to enemies with 50% or less HP within Attack Range
